page.title: 05THE STUDIO BRANSCOMBE.
page.content: Mr and Mrs Kirby have a small family business in complete home furnishings in Branscombe.Their son Simon makes all the wooden parts of the furniture in the woodwork shop.There is an area where carpets and material samples are displayed and a working area where there is a huge table for cutting out the materials for soft furnishings. Most of the materials is bought in London.Mr and Mr Kirby had the same sort of business in Yorkshire before they came to Devon.The studio was converted from a egg packing station about 16 years ago.Work has been carried out fore many well known people and some of their goods sent abroad.
